Description: Vintage Tone Smith 316 Electric Guitar with Bigsby Tremolo - Guitar has been tested and is in working condition. The electronics, switches, knobs are are all functional. It has the original Tone Smith grilles on the pickups. There are some dings and scratches on the head neck and body, especially on the rear of the body. I tried to photograph them all, but there will be some scuffs/scratches and dings not shown in the pictures. There is a crack on the rear electronic cover plate. If you would like any other photos, please ask. I'm not sure of the year of this guitar, the serial number is 004098. Original owner wrote their name on the inside of the guitar near the model number. This guitar will ship with a canvas guitar bag.
